ref: 12839 saṁkṣipati ʻ dashes together ʼ MBh. 2. saṁkṣipta -- . Nir. [saṁkṣipyatē ʻ shrinks ʼ Mn. -- √kṣip]
Pa. saṅkhipati ʻ heaps together, abridges ʼ,

lang: Language of `Kharoṣṭhī Inscriptions discovered by Sir Aurel Stein in Chinese Turkestan' edited by A. M. Boyer, E. J. Rapson, and E. Senart

ref: Si. hakavanavā ʻ to contract, block (a passage or stream) ʼ.
